body.name: The Original Korcci Microwaveable Silicone Popcorn Popper, BPA Free Microwave Popcorn Popper, Collapsible Microwave Popcorn Maker Bowl, Dishwasher Safe - Red

features: [HEALTHY ALTERNATIVE] : Most prepackaged microwavable popcorn has so much added artificial ingredients and sodium, but with our silicone popcorn popper, there will be no need to worry about what's going in your body, you’ll be the judge of that. This microwave popcorn bowl is also a good choice as a Halloween, Christmas gift for friends and family.

[SPACE SAVER] : This popper is collapsible, so you can store it basically anywhere in your kitchen. The diameter of this product is 9 3/8 inches, the original height is 5 7/8 inches, and the folded height is 2 3/8 inches. It saves space for storage after folding. Perfect for traveling and a great space saver for college dorms.

[EASY TO USE] : This silicone microwavable popcorn popper is simple to use, clean and put away. The silicone makes for a long-lasting effect, so you will not have to search for a replacement popper after using this one.

【New Upgraded Design】: Logo directly engraved with mold. Don't worry about the logo peeling off during use, which will not only affect the appearance, but also worry about food safety issues. Thickened silicone, will not be too soft to stand up, more durable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Use KORCCI Microwave Popcorn Popper To Make Popcorn Easily And Happily! The KORCCI Microwave Popcorn Popper Bowl is made of premium food grade silicone, highly durable, heat resistant, BPA and PVC free. Unique design distributes heat evenly, with little if any unpopped core. It is equipped with a lid and handle, which can be easily removed from the microwave.

Make Healthy And Delicious Popcorn By Yourself In Minutes Use KORCCI Popcorn Popper to make your popcorn in 2-4 minutes in a revolutionary silicone bowl. You and your family can make it as healthy as you want, or follow your inner chef to create a recipe book full of culinary imagination. Ditch the noisy electric hot air popcorn, slow stovetop popcorn and harmful microwave popcorn bags.

A Variety Of Flavors For You To Choose Just pour the popcorn kernels into the KORCCI popcorn popper bowl, then put it in the microwave, and you can get a bowl of popcorn in just a few minutes. In the process of making popcorn, you can add various spices according to your taste. ( Such as butter, chocolate, olive, coconut oil, salt, etc. )

Easy To Clean And Store, Dishwasher Safe Collapsible Design - KORCCI Microwave Popcorn Popper adopts a foldable design, the height after collapsing is 2.3 inches, which can save space and store conveniently. Easy To Clean - KORCCI Silicone Popcorn Popper can be easily cleaned by hand or in the dishwasher.

1. Pour an appropriate amount of corn kernels into the KORCCI Popcorn Popper Bowl and place the lid on. 2. Heat for 2-4 minutes according to your microwave power. 3. Recommended to add and mix all the seasonings you want after the popcorn is over. 4. Serve as a healthy snack any time of day! Cautions Use with adult supervision only and do not leave unattended while cooking popcorn kernels.Make sure that no other grains are accidentally mixed with the popcorn kernels before heating.Do not pour a number of kernels above the upper line ( which located at the bottom of the bowl ).Popcorn kernels may burn if overcooked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purchase in awhile!
reviews.reviewText: I saw this popper on a Weight Watchers FB page. People were saying how good it was. I thought I'd give it a shot. WOW! It is great! You can make popcorn in the microwave with no oil at all. It pops almost all of the kernels. Easy to use and easy to clean. Collapses for easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little popcorn maker is perfect! Not only is it much healthier than your store-bought microwave popcorn because there’s no oils or chemicals in it, but it’s super easy to use, and since there’s no oils, it’s very easy to clean. I buy a spray butter from Walmart or Amazon, and buy my own seasonings. Perfect for popcorn lovers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable microwave popping, can be collapsed for travel
reviews.reviewText: We bought our first one 3 years ago, still doing fine. Reliable popping in various microwaves. Bought 2 more, one for our cabin with a smaller microwave (works fine), and one for traveling (easy to pack, works in hotel microwaves). No cleanup needed if you dump into another bowl before spraying with butter Pam or salting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best things I've purchased on Amazon. It is so easy to use and since you don't have to use oil to pop the corn, it's easy to clean. It works great and the best part, it's compact so after you use it, you can just push it down, put on the lid and stick it back in the cupboard. It takes up very little space. I would definitely buy this for a gift or even get another one for my home in Michigan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for Oil-Free Popcorn
reviews.reviewText: I love that I can easily microwave popcorn in a reusable container without oil. The popcorn tastes great and never burns. It's perfect. I also like that I can store this easily and compactly.The only downside is that when I clean it in the dishwasher, water spots are left on the silicone. Perhaps this can be solved with a simple rinse-aid.I have my own and have purchased two others as gifts for friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great popcorn popper
reviews.reviewText: I bought this popcorn popper for my husband that has popcorn almost every day! He love it makes very good popcorn fast and easy. Cleans up like a dream and easy to store to boot .I would highly recommend this item you would regret it !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Easy to wash. Easy to store. This popper is so ideal that I got them and some popping corn for my teenage grandchildren for Christmas. Now they pop the popcorn for movie nights!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I gave this to my mom, and she loves it
reviews.reviewText: She said it pops nearly all the popcorn kernels, if she monitors and times it properly, doesn't burn the popcorn (don't add ANYTHING but popcorn kernels before putting it in the microwave), and it comes out tasting great.ALSO: if you routinely have paper plates in the microwave to catch spills, REMOVE them before using this; they WILL scorch, if not burn.UPDATE: I finally used it myself, and it works so well that I actually wish I liked plain popcorn. This popper makes it so easy to make great popcorn. It stands up well once unfolded (expanded?) and seems well manufactured. I love that it's made of silicone so it can be simply rinsed and left out to dry, as well as collapsed and squished a bit to make it fit in small areas.The handles do get pretty warm while the corn is popping, but not so hot that I needed to protect my fingers before I pull it out of the microwave.
O produto é de boa qualidade e chegou rápido. Adorei porque é uma maneira de fazer pipoca fácil e saudável. É um produto fácil de lavar. Recomendo.

La he usado en tres ocasiones desde que la adquirí y el único pero que tengo es que aún no le atino al tiempo en el microondas, no creo que sea problema del producto sino del microondas mismo.El sabor de las palomitas es algo diferente al no usar aceite y no se impregna de la misma manera la sal despues de ponerla en un topper para consumirlas, pero no lo veo como malo sino benéfico para la salud.Lo lavas y lo almacenas fácilmente.Muchísimo más práctico que usar el sarten con aceite, etc.
Excellent product - easy to use, clean, store and measure quantity - all kernels popped and no burnt popcorn. 5/5 on satisfaction by me

This product surprised me at how simple and good it works.I use a Inverter Microwave Oven and it only takes 3 minutes to pop, any longer and you risk the popcorn burning.Just be careful when taking it out of the microwave as it is very hot to touch.
